name: Sthaagni's cult
description:
Welcome to Sthaagni’s cult !

As master said:  «Sthaagni need each day a  blood offerings. The cultist who gather  the less for the cult will serve as sacrifice for the almighty Sthaagni»

Move with A & D

Jump with W or Space

And Dash until three time in a raw with E or Left click

Go Gather some gold or statues to offer to your master before someone else gave the daily amount to not be the sacrifice, but care about other cultist ! They are bad fellows that can ty to rob or kill you.

Our Staff:

Dorian Ribeiro as Game Designer

Paul Lyaudet as Game Designer

Loline Bongiraud as Concept artist:
